timeline.bodyText: Should we only enable this option if --debugger is passed? The only other use-case I can think of is if they pass --haskell-backend-command directly, and also want to use this option, but then tehy can just add --repl-script to their --haskell-backend-command.
timeline.author: ehildenb

replies.bodyText: I mean, if anything it should be an error to pass this flag but not --debugger. I can implement that behavior if you'd like.
replies.author: dwightguth

replies.bodyText: Up to you, I don't think it's worth blocking the merge. But yes, that's what I meant, this flag should only be passed if --debugger is passed. If it's simple, we might as well do it I think.
replies.author: ehildenb
